item.title: 欧洲似乎无法摆脱俄罗斯的能源习惯
item.description: 三年前，俄罗斯是世界上最大的天然气出口国，而欧洲则是其最大的客户。对于欧洲大陆的领导人来说，获得俄罗斯廉价能源的机会超过了与弗拉基米尔-普京总统做生意的疑虑。【原文：Three years ago, Russia was the world’s biggest exporter of natural gas and Europe was its top customer. For the continent’s leaders, access to all that cheap Russian energy outweighed any misgivings over doing business with President Vladimir Putin.】

item.title: 欧盟旨在通过新的拍卖指南阻止中国氢能技术的发展
item.description: 欧盟将采取措施，将中国制造的电解氢器排除在即将举行的拍卖之外，该拍卖旨在促进该集团在绿色转型期间使用氢燃料。【原文：The European Union will take steps to exclude Chinese manufactured hydrogen electrolyzers from an upcoming auction aimed at spurring the use of the fuel during the bloc’s green transition.】

item.title: 亚马逊 40 亿美元的人类学交易获英国监管机构批准
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）与人工智能公司 Anthropic 签订的 40 亿美元投资协议将避免受到深入调查，这是对大型科技公司在人工智能领域大肆挥霍的高度关注。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s $4 billion investment pact with AI firm Anthropic will avoid an in-depth probe, following heightened scrutiny on big tech’s AI spending spree.】

item.title: LinkedIn 的人工智能默认设置对用户来说并不那么私密
item.description: LinkedIn 的人工智能培训风波提醒我们，告诉用户他们可以 "选择退出 "某些服务是毫无意义的。但首先...【原文：LinkedIn’s AI-training kerfuffle is a stark reminder that telling users they can “opt out” of something is mostly meaningless. But first...】

item.title: 苹果投资者未受人工智能 iPhone 需求不振的影响
item.description: 购物者对 iPhone 16 的反应平平，但这并没有影响投资者对苹果公司股价的热情。【原文：A tepid response from shoppers to the iPhone 16 has not dented investors’ enthusiasm for Apple Inc. shares, which enjoyed a multi-month rally in anticipation of the launch.】

item.title: 汇丰银行在资产负债表清理中偿还 24 年前的遗留资本
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在偿还一种早在 2000 年就已发行的资本，因为该公司正在继续清理其账簿上那些在全球金融危机后进行全面改革后已经过时的票据。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is repaying a type of capital issued back in 2000 as it continues to clean up its books of instruments that have been rendered obsolete after the overhaul that followed the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 肯尼亚最大的无线公司正在与马斯克的星链公司谈判
item.description: 肯尼亚最大的电话公司 Safaricom Plc 首席执行官 Peter Ndegwa 表示，该公司正在与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 及其他卫星供应商就未来可能的合作进行谈判。【原文：Kenya’s biggest phone company Safaricom Plc is in talks with Elon Musk’s Starlink and other satellite providers on potential future partnerships, its Chief Executive Officer Peter Ndegwa said.】

item.title: 巴西收益紧缩，债务基金拒绝新投资者
item.description: 巴西一些最大的基金管理公司正在从该国蓬勃发展的地方公司债市场中后退一步。【原文：Some of Brazil’s biggest fund managers are taking a step back from the country’s booming market for local corporate debt.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金在中国故障后陷入空头挤压
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士称，随着中国股市出现多年来最大涨幅，周五中国的一些量化对冲基金受到严重打击。【原文：A number of quantitative hedge funds in China were hit severely on Friday as the nation’s equities staged their biggest rally in years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲放贷人疯狂发放 AT1贷款，丝毫不为监管机构的冷落所动
item.description: 欧洲银行在一个月内发行的额外一级债券比以往任何时候都多，这消除了人们对这种高风险债券在澳大利亚监管机构冷落后的前景的担忧。【原文：European banks have issued more Additional Tier 1 bonds in a single month than ever before, dashing concerns about the future of the risky bonds following a snub from Australia’s regulator.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储偏好的通胀指标即将出台，中国的刺激政策涟漪仍在继续，Arm 公司也在关注英特尔的部分股权。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The Fed’s preferred inflation metric is coming, Chinese stimulus ripples continue and Arm casts an eye on part of Intel. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 德国商业银行的 Orlopp 将加入裕信银行的电话会议，规划发展道路
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）即将上任的首席执行官将与意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的官员讨论如何开展合作，而就在两周前，这家意大利贷款机构还表示可能试图收购这家规模较小的竞争对手。【原文：The incoming chief executive officer of Commerzbank AG is set to discuss with UniCredit SpA officials how to work together, just two weeks after the Italian lender said it may try to purchase the smaller competitor.】

item.title: 分析师疑虑增加，诺和诺德Wegovy推动的涨势逐渐减弱
item.description: 肥胖症药物的炒作推动诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）大幅上涨，但这种炒作似乎已经黔驴技穷。【原文：The obesity-drug hype that fueled huge gains in Novo Nordisk A/S looks to be running out of steam.】

item.title: 迪拜股市升至十年高位后面临地区风险
item.description: 随着地缘政治风险的增加以及低廉的估值越来越难找到，迪拜股票跻身全球表现最佳股票行列的涨势似乎将降温。【原文：A rally that’s propelled Dubai stocks into the ranks of the best global performers looks set to cool as geopolitical risks increase and bargain valuations become harder to find.】

item.title: 据说津巴布韦将使黄金支持的 ZiG 对美元贬值 44
item.description: 据四家国库交易商称，津巴布韦周五向银行出售的黄金支持货币兑美元汇率比现行汇率低 44%，这实际上使该货币单位贬值。【原文：Zimbabwe sold its gold-backed currency to banks at 44% less than the prevailing rate against the dollar Friday, according to four treasury dealers, effectively devaluing the unit.】

item.title: 芬兰提议在东南部城镇设立北约陆地指挥部
item.description: 芬兰国防部长安蒂-哈卡宁（Antti Hakkanen）周五表示，芬兰已提议在东南部城镇米凯利（Mikkeli）建立一支新的北约陆地指挥部队。【原文：Finland has proposed to locate a new NATO land command unit in the southeastern town of Mikkeli, Defense Minister Antti Hakkanen said on Friday.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称，RWE 首席执行官激发了股票回购的希望
item.description: 根据杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Germany’s RWE AG management hinted the energy company could consider share buybacks to appease investors after a lackluster share price performance, according to a sales trading note from Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将在计划到期后决定国际货币基金组织新协议的类型
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部表示，肯尼亚将在现有安排到期后决定下一个国际货币基金组织计划的类型。【原文：Kenya will decide on the type of its next International Monetary Fund program upon the expiry of the current arrangement, according to the Treasury.】

item.title: 中国助推奢侈品复兴，奢侈品股票将迎来多年来最好的一周
item.description: 欧洲奢侈品股票的走势在一周内发生了翻天覆地的变化。【原文：The narrative on European luxury-goods stocks has flipped in the space of a week.】

item.title: 美银美林策略师哈特内特认为国际股票是最佳中国投资机会之一
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，中国的大规模刺激措施可能会推动市场广泛转向美国以外的股票以及新兴市场和大宗商品。【原文：China’s sweeping stimulus measures could drive a broad rotation into stocks outside the US, as well as emerging markets and commodities, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 习近平经济刺激周旨在为中国经济放缓划清界限
item.description: 几个月来，在股市下跌、物价下跌和中国各地不满情绪增加的情况下，习近平主席似乎对经济增长放缓毫不动容。本周的情况表明，他不愿再忍受更多的痛苦。【原文：For months, President Xi Jinping appeared unfazed by slowing growth as stocks sank, prices fell and discontent grew around China. This week showed he’s not willing to tolerate any more pain.】

item.title: CD&R公司在赛诺菲的最终竞购中排除了债务出资的股权选择权
item.description: Clayton Dubilier & Rice 在竞购赛诺菲消费者保健部门时，将银行承诺提供超过 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的债务作为其部分股权支票的条件，尽管该贷款最终没有被纳入提交给这家制药公司的最终方案中。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice made it a condition for banks to commit more than €1 billion ($1.1 billion) of debt to fund a part of the equity check for its bid for Sanofi’s consumer-health division, though the facility didn’t end up in the final package presented to the pharmaceutical firm.】

item.title: 游戏开发商维塔士寻求在日本收购和发展
item.description: 维塔士公司为世界上一些大型游戏的开发提供支持，该公司计划在未来几个月内收购一家日本工作室，以扩大其在世界第三大视频游戏市场的影响力。【原文：Virtuos, which supports the development of some of the world’s biggest games, plans to acquire a Japanese studio in the coming months to expand its presence in the No. 3 video game market.】

item.title: 能源老板为人工智能和零净排放全面改造电网
item.description: 作为国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）的首席执行官，约翰-佩蒂格鲁（John Pettigrew）站在美国和英国绿色转型的最前沿。这位 55 岁的行业资深人士将这种努力比作英国在维多利亚时代对基础设施的快速投资。【原文：As chief executive officer of National Grid Plc, John Pettigrew is on the frontlines of the green transition in the US and the UK. Building out power lines is critical to electrifying the economy and shifting away from fossil fuels, and the 55-year-old industry veteran likens the effort to Britain’s rapid investment in infrastructure in the Victorian era.】

item.title: 英国取消电网连接队列中一些停滞不前的 "僵尸 "项目
item.description: 英国电力网络运营商已经砍掉了 10 千兆瓦停滞不前的 "僵尸 "能源项目，切断了阻碍该国清洁电力转型的基础设施队列。【原文：UK electricity network operators have axed 10 gigawatts of stalled “zombie” energy projects, cutting the queue that’s holding up infrastructure critical to the country’s clean-power transition.】

item.title: 字节跳动将签署创亚洲纪录的 108 亿美元企业贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）将签署一笔 108 亿美元的贷款，这将是除日本外亚洲有史以来最大的美元企业融资。【原文：ByteDance Ltd., the Chinese owner of TikTok, is set to sign a $10.8 billion loan in what would be the largest-ever dollar-denominated corporate facility in Asia ex-Japan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 第四次提议收购英国房屋网站 Rightmove
item.description: REA Group Ltd. 在不到一个月的时间内对 Rightmove Plc 提出了第四份收购提案，对这家英国房地产门户网站的估值约为 62 亿英镑（87 亿美元）。【原文：REA Group Ltd. has made a fourth takeover proposal in less than a month for Rightmove Plc, valuing the UK property portal at about £6.2 billion ($8.7 billion).】

item.title: 桑坦德银行求助于 DE Shaw 对冲与法国农业信贷银行的风险投资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）对冲了其在与法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）成立的资产服务合资企业中的股权，因为这家西班牙银行正努力减轻监管负担。【原文：Banco Santander SA hedged its equity stake in an asset servicing joint venture with Credit Agricole SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as the Spanish bank seeks to lighten its regulatory burden.】

item.title: 欧洲央行 10 月降息可能性增大，欧洲债券大涨
item.description: 欧洲债券周五反弹，延续了本周的涨势，这使得10月份降息的可能性大大增加。【原文：European bonds rallied on Friday, extending gains in a week that’s left the prospect of an interest-rate cut in October looking far more likely.】

item.title: 受欧盟关税影响，中国奇瑞推迟在西班牙生产电动汽车的计划
item.description: 在欧盟对从中国进口的电动汽车征收临时关税后，奇瑞汽车公司将在欧洲生产电动汽车的目标推迟了一年。【原文：Chery Automobile Co. has pushed back a goal to bring electric-vehicle production to Europe by a year, after the European Union imposed provisional tariffs on EV imports from China.】
